an5.117:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam niraye.
an5.117:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam niraye.
an5.117:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam sagge.
an5.117:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagata bhikkhuni yathabhatam nikkhitta evam sagge”ti.
